sqlMap.sql: select u.PRD_RETURN_ID, u.PRD_RETURN_NO, u.BILL_TYPE, u.FROM_BILL_ID, u.FROM_BILL_NO, u.RETURN_CHANN_ID, u.RETURN_CHANN_NO, u.RETURN_CHANN_NAME, to_char(u.EXPECT_RETURNDATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') EXPECT_RETURNDATE, u.REMARK, u.AUDIT_ID, u.AUDIT_NAME, to_char(u.AUDIT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AUDIT_TIME, u.RETURN_RSON, u.YEAR_MONTH, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG, u.RSP_NAME from DRP_RETURN_A u
sqlMap.select: select count(0) cnt FROM DRP_RETURN_A u
sqlMap.insert: insert into DRP_RETURN_A( PRD_RETURN_ID, CRE_NAME, CREATOR, CRE_TIME, UPD_NAME, UPDATOR, UPD_TIME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, LEDGER_ID, LEDGER_NAME, STATE, DEL_FLAG )values( #PRD_RETURN_ID#, #CRE_NAME#, #CREATOR#, sysdate, #UPD_NAME#, #UPDATOR#, sysdate, #DEPT_ID#, #DEPT_NAME#, #ORG_ID#, #ORG_NAME#, #LEDGER_ID#, #LEDGER_NAME#, #STATE#, #DEL_FLAG# )
sqlMap.update:
update DRP_RETURN_A
UPD_NAME = #UPD_NAME# UPDATOR = #UPDATOR# UPD_TIME = sysdate STATE = #STATE#
where PRD_RETURN_ID = #PRD_RETURN_ID#
sqlMap.delete: update DRP_RETURN_A set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# ,UPD_NAME=#UPD_NAME# ,UPDATOR=#UPDATOR# ,UPD_TIME=sysdate where PRD_RETURN_ID = #PRD_RETURN_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select u.PRD_RETURN_ID, u.PRD_RETURN_NO, u.BILL_TYPE, u.FROM_BILL_ID, u.FROM_BILL_NO, u.RETURN_CHANN_ID, u.RETURN_CHANN_NO, u.RETURN_CHANN_NAME, to_char(u.EXPECT_RETURNDATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') EXPECT_RETURNDATE, u.REMARK, u.AUDIT_ID, u.AUDIT_NAME, to_char(u.AUDIT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AUDIT_TIME, u.RETURN_RSON, u.YEAR_MONTH, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG, u.RSP_NAME from DRP_RETURN_A u where u.PRD_RETURN_ID = #PRD_RETURN_ID#
sqlMap.sql: select u.PRD_RETURN_DTL_ID, u.PRD_RETURN_ID, u.FROM_BILL_DTL_ID, u.PRD_ID, u.PRD_NO, u.PRD_NAME, u.PRD_SPEC, u.PRD_COLOR, u.BRAND, u.STD_UNIT, u.RETURN_PRICE, u.RETURN_NUM, u.RETURN_AMOUNT, u.RETURN_RSON, u.YEAR_MONTH, u.PRD_TYPE, u.DEL_FLAG, a.SPCL_TECH_FLAG, a.SPCL_TECH_ID, a.DM_SPCL_TECH_NO, a.SPCL_SPEC_REMARK from DRP_RETURN_DTL_A u left join DRP_SPCL_TECH a on u.SPCL_TECH_ID=a.SPCL_TECH_ID and a.USE_FLAG=1
sqlMap.insert: insert into DRP_RETURN_DTL_A( PRD_RETURN_DTL_ID, PRD_RETURN_ID, DEL_FLAG )values( #PRD_RETURN_DTL_ID#, #PRD_RETURN_ID#, #DEL_FLAG# )
sqlMap.delete: update DRP_RETURN_DTL_A set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where PRD_RETURN_DTL_ID in ($PRD_RETURN_DTL_IDS$)
update DRP_RETURN_DTL_A set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where PRD_RETURN_ID = #PRD_RETURN_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select u.PRD_RETURN_ID, u.PRD_RETURN_NO, u.BILL_TYPE, u.FROM_BILL_ID, u.FROM_BILL_NO, u.RETURN_CHANN_ID, u.RETURN_CHANN_NO, u.RETURN_CHANN_NAME, to_char(u.EXPECT_RETURNDATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') EXPECT_RETURNDATE, u.REMARK, u.AUDIT_ID, u.AUDIT_NAME, to_char(u.AUDIT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AUDIT_TIME, u.RETURN_RSON, u.YEAR_MONTH, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, d.PRD_NO, d.PRD_NAME, d.PRD_SPEC, d.PRD_COLOR, d.PRD_TYPE, d.BRAND, d.STD_UNIT, d.RETURN_PRICE, d.RETURN_NUM, d.RETURN_AMOUNT, d.RETURN_RSON, d.YEAR_MONTH, t.SPCL_DTL_REMARK, u.RSP_NAME from DRP_RETURN_A u left join DRP_RETURN_DTL_A d on u.PRD_RETURN_ID=d.PRD_RETURN_ID left join DRP_SPCL_TECH t on d.SPCL_TECH_ID=t.SPCL_TECH_ID where d.DEL_FLAG = 0
